ing: 2 (16 ounce) packages miniature smoked sausage links
des: "These addictive little appetizers are so easy to make, and great for potlucks as well. This recipe could easily be changed up to suit your taste."
ins: Combine grape jelly and barbeque sauce in a slow cooker. Stir in the miniature smoked sausage links. Cook on High, until heated through, 2 to 3 hours.
